editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-96r: Pauline Epistles. F-18v: Romans. Tedros Abraha, La Lettera ai Romani Testo e commentary della versione Etiopica, AF 57 (Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz, 2001). F-35v: 1 Corinthians. F-46v: 2 Corinthians. F-52v: Galatians. F-58r: Ephesians. Siegbert Uhlig and Helge Maehlum, Novum Testamentum aethiopice: die Gefangenschaftsbriefe, AF 33 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). F-62r: Philippians. Siegbert Uhlig and Helge Maehlum, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die Gefangenschaftsbriefe, AF 33 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). F-65v: Colossians. Siegbert Uhlig and Helge Maehlum, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die Gefangenschaftsbriefe, AF 33 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). F-69r: 1 Thessalonians. F-71r: 2 Thessalonians. F-75v: 1 Timothy. F-79r: 2 Timothy. F-81r: Titus. F-82r: Philemon. Siegbert Uhlig and Helge Maehlum, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die Gefangenschaftsbriefe, AF 33 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). F-96r: Hebrews. F-100v: Introduction to the Pauline Epistles and the General Epistles, written in a smaller hand. F-116r: General Epistles. F-104v: 1 Peter. Josef Hofmann and Siegbert Uhlig, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die katholischen Briefe, AF 29 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). F-107r: 2 Peter. Josef Hofmann and Siegbert Uhlig, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die katholischen Briefe, AF 29 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). F-110v: 1 John. Josef Hofmann and Siegbert Uhlig, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die katholischen Briefe, AF 29 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). F-111r: 2 John. Josef Hofmann and Siegbert Uhlig, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die katholischen Briefe, AF 29 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). F: 3 John. Josef Hofmann and Siegbert Uhlig, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die katholischen Briefe, AF 29 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). F-115r: James. F-116r: Jude. Josef Hofmann and Siegbert Uhlig, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die katholischen Briefe, AF 29 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). ii v: Chart, with illegible text. : record of birth and death of አለቃ ወልደ ቂርቆስ, of the Land of Lamwasha (ብሔረ ለምዋሽ), born in 1848. He died on Ṭəqəmt 10, 1910 and was buried in ደብረ ብሥራት ዜና ማርቆስ, written in pencil.
